```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(kableExtra)
```

## Meeting Schedule

```{r, warning=FALSE}
Day <- c(1:26)
Date <- c("1/23", "1/28", "1/30", "2/4", "2/6", "2/11", "2/13", "2/18", "2/20", "2/25", "2/27",
          "3/3", "3/5", "3/17", "3/19", "3/24",
          "3/26", "3/31", "4/2", "4/7", "4/9", "4/14", "4/16", "4/21", "4/23", "4/28")
Topic <- c("Intro", "Intro R and plots","Data manipulation","Tidy Data","Tidy Data","Reproducible research",
           "R Markdown", "Databases", "Shell","Shell","Shell","Shell",
           "Shell", "Shell","HPC","Git", "Git", "Git", 
            "Data in python", "Python", "Python", 
           "Python", "Functions", "Functions","Testing","Scripting")

meetings <- cbind(Day, Date, Topic)

kable(meetings, "html") %>%  
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive"))
```
